name: Ski Jump - Winter Games Ski Jumping Game
name_original: Ski Jump - Winter Games Ski Jumping Game
description:
Ski Jump - Winter Games Ski Jumping Game is an excellent new ski jumping game with astonishing realism using a first person view.

Descend down a specially constructed takeoff ramp (known as the inrun), jump from the end of it (the table) with as much power as you can generate, and "fly" as far as possible down a steeply sloped hill.

Points are awarded for distance and style
